  • Method Details

    • closeClient

      protected void closeClient(RMIConnection arg0)
      Description copied from class: RMIServerImpl

      Closes a client connection made by makeClient.

      Specified by:
      closeClient in class RMIServerImpl
      Parameters:
      arg0 - a connection previously returned by makeClient on which the closeClient method has not previously been called. The behavior is unspecified if these conditions are violated, including the case where client is null.

    • closeServer

      protected void closeServer()
      Description copied from class: RMIServerImpl

      Called by RMIServerImpl.close() to close the connector server. After returning from this method, the connector server must not accept any new connections.

      Specified by:
      closeServer in class RMIServerImpl

    • export

      protected void export()
      Description copied from class: RMIServerImpl

      Specified by:

    • getProtocol

      protected String getProtocol()
      Description copied from class: RMIServerImpl

      Returns the protocol string for this object. The string is rmi for RMI/JRMP and iiop for RMI/IIOP.

      Specified by:
      getProtocol in class RMIServerImpl
      Returns:
      the protocol string for this object.

    • makeClient

      protected RMIConnection makeClient(String arg0, Subject arg1)
      Description copied from class: RMIServerImpl

      Creates a new client connection. This method is called by the public method RMIServerImpl.newClient(Object).

      Specified by:
      makeClient in class RMIServerImpl
      Parameters:
      arg0 - the ID of the new connection. Every connection opened by this connector server will have a different ID. The behavior is unspecified if this parameter is null.
      arg1 - the authenticated subject. Can be null.
      Returns:
      the newly-created RMIConnection.
